'''Villains Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160731132516/http://mojang.com/2016/07/villains-skin-pack-now-ruthlessly-subjugating-pocket-edition/|title=Villains skin pack ruthlessly conquers Pocket Edition|website=Mojang.com|author=Marsh Davies|date=July 28, 2016}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]], that consists of 17 villainous characters, representing various mechanics and blocks from ''Minecraft''. In promotion of this skin pack, a downloadable world called [[Villains Map]] was released.
